name: MAKERUNA MAKENDO2
description:
Hikaru is a challenger in the mysterious contest which will determine the leader of all monster-kind.

Swift sword action with original characters has made this a fan favorite!
A wondrous comedic fighting action game awaits!

You must help Hikaru decide her destiny. For better... or for worse...

This title has been converted from the original PlayStation® disc to PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation® disc version, or where some features may not function properly. This version does not support PlayStation® peripherals (controller, memory card, multitap, etc.), therefore functionalities such as multiplayer, versus, and co-op modes are not available.



"PS one" is a registered trademarks of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

Purchase indicates acceptance of the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service/User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
